channel.title: Big problem with crowns!
channel.description:
Hello,
I have added special crowns to my server but the player see;s there custom crown but everybody else sees the custom crown as a normal gold crown?
Any help plz

item.title: Big problem with crowns!
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

Yh everybody is using the same client ive even multi logged with the same client and it still doesnt work.

Read full topic

item.title: Big problem with crowns!
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

You need to add to the updated version of the client to .rar again & re-upload otherwise your players will not be able to see the new crowns.

Read full topic

item.title: Big problem with crowns!
item.dc:creator: @Ikoedlalampara Ikoedlalampara
item.description:
@Ikoedlalampara wrote:

lol… anything u update client side has to be compiled, tested, rar’d, re uploaded for everyone to see
anything server sided has to be compiled and rebooted.

Read full topic

item.title: Big problem with crowns!
item.dc:creator: @billyjr33 billyjr33
item.description:
@billyjr33 wrote:

[quote=“pk george1, post:1, topic:328602”]Hello,

I have added special crowns to my server but the player see;s there custom crown but everybody else sees the custom crown as a normal gold crown?

Any help plz[/quote]

upload ur client so after everyone downloads it they will be able to see it u have to do this every time u edit ur client

Read full topic
